description: Critics accuse Prime Minister Viktor Orban of exploiting the coronavirus crisis to silence opposition.
title: Coronavirus: Hungary government gets sweeping powers
title_page: Coronavirus: Hungary government gets sweeping powers - BBC News
maintext: "When anger and resentment is incited against us in the media, it serves only to demean and silence the voices of those who have heroically taken their places on the frontlines of public health," wrote Peter Magyari in 444, a critical news portal.
